item.description: The South has the lowest fertility rate in the world, but the North's labor-intensive industries will be hit more acutely in the near term.

item.title: Man Takes Bite at Seafood Restaurant, Spits Out 'Rare' Purple Pearl
item.description: "When he bit into it, he thought it was a big pebble, but when he took it out, he saw it was the pearl," his daughter told Newsweek.
